metadata.title: CVE-2024-47714 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:wifi: mt76: mt7996: use hweight16 to get correct tx antennaThe chainmask is u16 so using hweight8 cannot get correct tx_ant.Without this patch, the tx_ant of band 2 would be -1 and lead to thefollowing issue:BUG: KASAN: stack-out-of-bounds in mt7996_mcu_add_sta+0x12e0/0x16e0[mt7996e]

criterions.comment: linux package in oracular is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication (note: '6.11.0-17.17').
linux-aws package in oracular is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication (note: '6.11.0-1009.10').
